text.tspan: Collect 20 vp Before type Runs out.
* Clear all bandits from a tile: +2VP

tspan.tspan: If at the start of your turn your hand
is full of Danger cards you are out

text.tspan: Build a railway where you are

tspan.tspan: This turn you may move on
This turn, you may move on
As Bandits Attack, but with steps 4 and 5 before 2 and 3
Move up to n spaces. You may activate multiple movement
- Most tiles tiles cost 1 to step onto.
- Mountains cost 2, water cannot be stepped on
For each group of bandits on the board Roll 1 d6.

text.tspan: On: 1 - Move north , 2 - Move East, 3 - Move south, 4 or 5 - Move West.

tspan.tspan: 6 - Add a bandit to the group
Bandits can move on any type of land (even unrevealed), but if they
would move off the map, add a bandit instead.
Roll as many d12 as indicated by the furthest along
tracker on the board. Then place a bandit counter in each
Bandits roll dice like players. 3,4,5 => 1 success. 6 => 2 successes.
For each group of bandits on the same tile as any players:
1) Players may activate as many defence or attack jobs as they like.
2) Bandits roll 1 dice per bandit to hit. Players roll their defence.
3) For every Hit above the players combined defences, all players on
4) Players roll their Attack, and Bandits roll 1 dice per bandit to save.
5) For every Attack point above5 bandit saves remove 1 bandit.
